thought.author: Cory House
description: Code for humans, not machines! We just can't overemphasis the importance of writing clean, comprehensive and maintainable code enough. Today's #ThoughtsOnProgramming features Cory House with a superb analogy on why your code should tell a story and be self-explanatory.
